title: American Grown with Trinidadian Roots - Trinidad Premium T-Shirt
features: Solid colors: 100% Cotton; Heather Grey: 90% Cotton, 10% Polyester; All Other Heathers: 58% Cotton, 42% Polyester

Show off USA pride and pride in your Trini ancestry with this Family Heritage Gift. Perfect to wear at an family reunion, wedding, baby shower, birthday, mother's day, father's day, 4th of July or Christmas with matching America designs.
Represent bonds from Port of Spain to Washington. Perfect USA gift for an American who has family history in Trinidad and Tobago. Great for when celebrating Independence Day and Black History Month.
This premium t-shirt is made of lightweight fine jersey fabric
Fit: Men’s fit runs small, size up for a looser fit. Women’s fit is true to size, order usual size.
description: This design is the perfect way to represent the USA and Trinidad and Tobago. It is an ideal gift for family and friends and works perfectly in a gift bag at a wedding or family reunion. Be proud of your ancestry and share it with the world!
